aiga-louisville.name: AIGA Louisville
aiga-louisville.description: AIGA advances design as a professional craft, strategic advantage and vital cultural force. As the largest community of design advocates, we bring together practitioners, enthusiasts, and patrons to amplify the voice of design and create the vision for a collective future.

build-guild-louisville.name: Build Guild Louisville
build-guild-louisville.description: Build Guild is a monthly gathering for web folks that enjoy chatting over drinks. High-fives encouraged. Mustaches optional.

codecademy-louisville.name: Codecademy Louisville
codecademy-louisville.description: This Meetup is dedicated to helping beginners learn HTML, CSS and Web Design. Outlining the fundamentals, this Meetup's course works through all common elements of front-end design and development.

creative-mornings-louisville.name: Creative Mornings Louisville
creative-mornings-louisville.description: CreativeMornings is a breakfast lecture series for the creative community. Our free, monthly events feature a short talk and breakfast!

derbypy.name: DerbyPy
derbypy.frquency: Meets the 4th Tuesday every month at 6:30pm
derbypy.description: A meetup for anyone interested in the Python programming language.  All skill levels are welcome.  :)

elixir-louisville.name: Elixir Louisville
elixir-louisville.description: We are group of programmers, students, and technology enthusiasts who are excited about the Elixir programming language. We meet on the second Tuesday of every month to discuss topics related to the Elixir ecosystem, distributed systems, and functional programming. All skill levels are welcome!

ember-js-louisville.name: Ember.js Louisville
ember-js-louisville.description: Learning and meeting with Ember.js enthusiasts in Louisville, Kentucky. Ember.js Louisville is open to developers of any skill level. Our goal is to come together, share our stories, and learn to build ambitious web applications.

forest-giant.name: Forest Giant
forest-giant.description: Forest Giant is a company of designers, developers and strategists driven by opportunities to solve complex problems using software and technology. We frequently host tech and startup events for the local community - join us!

game-dev-lou.name: Game Dev Lou
game-dev-lou.description: Louisville's game development community. We support game developers of all skill levels and backgrounds. We want to create a safe environment where everyone can learn and participate.

gdg-louisville.name: Google Developer Group Louisville
gdg-louisville.description: We are a Google Developer Group! We will be discussing Android Development, but also incorporate most Google Development Products.

girl-develop-it-louisville.name: Girl Develop It Louisville
girl-develop-it-louisville.description: Women Developers and Programmers! Want to learn how to code? Have a great idea? Don't be shy. Develop it.

issa-kentuckiana.name: ISSA Kentuckiana
issa-kentuckiana.description: If you are interested in Information Security and live in the Kentuckiana region, then you’ve come to the right place.  Our chapter offers many benefits for seasoned security-minded professionals and relative newcomers to the field such as monthly meetings that provide opportunities for experiential learning and professional networking.

it-happy-hour.name: IT Happy Hour
it-happy-hour.description: The IT Happy Hour is a monthly event where IT People in the Louisville area can get together to discuss ideas and projects, fails and wins.

java-of-louisville.name: Java of Louisville
java-of-louisville.description: We are a Java Developer Group! Our focus is on newbies, and Students interested in the Java language.

jslou.name: JSLou
jslou.frequency: Meets the 1st and 3rd Wednesday every month @ 7pm
jslou.description: JSLou is a gathering where people of any experience level, and all types of JavaScript can feel right at home.

juggl.name: Java Users Group of Greater Louisville
juggl.description: We are a group of developers and enthusiasts who are interested in learning about Java, the Java Virtual Machine, and all of the things you can do on top of the JVM.

kipcug.name: Kentucky-Indiana PC Users Group (KIPCUG)
kipcug.description: A dynamic non-profit corporation,focused on educating and encouraging newcomers to computing as well as sharing technical information.

kyoss.name: Kentucky Open Source Society (KYOSS)
kyoss.description: The Kentucky Open Source Society (KYOSS) is a group of Programmers, Sysadmins, Devops, Linux enthusiasts, Web Developers, Mobile Developers, and just about anyone else who is interested in technology.

laravel-louisville.name: Laravel Louisville
laravel-louisville.description: We’re a group of web developers and PHP programmers who enjoy building software with the Laravel framework. The goal of Laravel Louisville is to help build the software engineering community in Louisville by teaching each other how to write quality software in PHP.

let-them-tweet-cake.name: Let Them Tweet Cake
let-them-tweet-cake.description: Sweet opportunities for women interested in technology and media.

louisville-agile-forum.name: Louisville Agile Forum
louisville-agile-forum.description: The Louisville Agile Forum consists of Agile practitioners in the greater Louisville area.  We like to share our Agile experiences, network and help others with challenges related to Agile adoption.

louisville-aws-user-group.name: Louisville AWS User Group
louisville-aws-user-group.description: Come check us out to learn and share how you're using the AWS platform.

louisville-bi-and-big-data-analytics-mee.name: Louisville BI & Big Data Analytics Meetup
louisville-bi-and-big-data-analytics-mee.frequency: Meets monthly on a Thursday at 6pm
louisville-bi-and-big-data-analytics-mee.description: If you are modernizing your business with Big Data and want your entire organization to benefit through compelling data visualizations, need to engage your audience with intuitive and interactive reports and dashboards on any device, or are new to BI and are interested to learn more about the use of BI in applications – then this group is for YOU!

louisville-cocoaheads.name: Louisville Cocoaheads
louisville-cocoaheads.description: Let's get together and discuss all things Objective-C and cocoa. Want to develop for the iPhone, iPad or the Mac? This is the group. We want to create a community to share ideas and knowledge, build developer technical skills and cultivate new developers.

louisville-civic-data-alliance.name: Louisville Civic Data Alliance
louisville-civic-data-alliance.description: We are Louisville's Code for America Brigade, called the Civic Data Alliance (CDA). Our mission is: Making Public Data Truly Public.

louisville-dot-net.name: Louisville .NET Meetup
louisville-dot-net.description: The Louisville .NET Meetup group is dedicated to helping developers around Louisville to become better developers with an emphasis on the Microsoft .NET technology stack.

louisville-geek-dinner.name: Louisville Geek Dinner
louisville-geek-dinner.description: A social networking event for those passionate about technology.

louisville-hardware-startup.name: Louisville Hardware Startup Meetup
louisville-hardware-startup.frequency: Meets the last Monday every month @ 6:30pm
louisville-hardware-startup.description: Louisville is a city with a rich manufacturing history, and is a hub for medicine, logistics, and so many other fields. Lots of places to go for Software Startups, but where are the hardware folks supposed to go? We're a group for folks interested in making real stuff, from makers to marketers, seasoned manufacturers to Kickstarting newbies.

louisville-haskell-meetup.name: Louisville Haskell Meetup
louisville-haskell-meetup.description: Meetup for Haskell enthusiasts. Haskell is an elegant and powerful language with a reputation for stretching your brain.

loumug.name: Louisville Microsoft Users Group
loumug.frequency: Meets the last Friday every month @ 11:30 am
loumug.description: It’s a forum for computer professionals in the Louisville area interested in gaining and sharing knowledge in Microsoft technologies through networking and education.

louposh.name: Louisville PowerShell Users Group
louposh.frequency: Meets the 3rd Thursday every month @5:30 pm
louposh.description: We are a community of IT professionals in and around the Louisville, KY area who share an interest in all things PowerShell.

louisville-ruby-brigade.name: Louisville Ruby Brigade
louisville-ruby-brigade.frequency: Meets the third Thursday every month @ 5:30 pm
louisville-ruby-brigade.description: Meetup for Ruby developers and the Ruby-curious.

louisville-scala-meetup.name: Louisville Scala Meetup
louisville-scala-meetup.description: Meetup for Scala developers, enthusiasts, and interested.

lousmug.name: Louisville Systems Management User Group
lousmug.description: Covering MS System Center and other products. We meet once a month, and attendance is free.

louspu.name: Louisville SharePoint Users
louspu.description: Lou SPU plans to meet every other month to have some fun and talk SharePoint.

louisville-software-engineering-meetup.name: Louisville Software Engineering Meetup
louisville-software-engineering-meetup.description: Formerly LouPUG, the Louisville PHP User Group, we have shifted our focus on Software Engineering. While code samples may still include PHP, we didn't want to limit our members to a single technology. If you are strictly interested in PHP, check out the KYOSS Meetup.

louisville-sql-server-users-group.name: Louisville SQL Server Users Group
louisville-sql-server-users-group.description: We represent the SQL Server community in Louisville, the surrounding metropolitan area, and throughout most of Kentucky. As a technical users group, we focus on monthly meetings, but also provide networking, learning opportunities, speaking opportunities, training, and collaboration for SQL Server professionals throughout the Ohio Valley area.

louisville-ux-meetup.name: Louisville UX Meetup
louisville-ux-meetup.description: A group for anyone interested in creating great experiences for the users of their products, websites, apps, robots, whatever. Join us to meet new people and chat about user centered design, lean UX, UI design, IA, usability, research, new tools and the importance of getting your ideas out of the building.

louisville-vmware-users-group.name: Louisville VMWare Users Group
louisville-vmware-users-group.description: Louisville VMUG is an independent, customer-led organization created to maximize our members’ use of VMware and Partner solutions through knowledge sharing, training, collaboration, and quarterly events.  Louisville VMUG focuses on providing presentations from local users across many different industries to share their experiences, solutions, and obstacles to solve real-world business requirements.

lvl1-hackerspace.name: LVL1 Hackerspace
lvl1-hackerspace.frequency: Open meetings every Tues at 8pm and assorted workshops
lvl1-hackerspace.description: LVL1 is Louisville's premier original hackerspace. We are friendly community of tinkerers, makers, engineers, educators, scientists, artists, hackers and overall geeks. Anyone who is, aspires to be, or just wants to hang around smart, creative, friendly mad scientist maker/hacker Louisvillians is welcome at LVL1! We’ve got lots of cool tools and equipment. We like to work on (and show off) fun and challenging technical projects.

mymobileville.name: My Mobile Ville
mymobileville.frequency: Meets online the 4th Tuesday every month @ 6:30pm
mymobileville.description: A meetup to discuss all things mobile! We meet on the 4th Tuesday if every month to discuss Android, iOS, and anything else that resembles mobile tech!

openhack-louisville.name: OpenHack Louisville
openhack-louisville.description: Code together on anything, learn from, and teach each other. Together we can have fun while becoming better at our craft.

technology-association-of-louisville-ken.name: Technology Association of Louisville Kentucky
technology-association-of-louisville-ken.description: The Technology Association of Louisville Kentucky (TALK) is the open membership association for the technology community in and around Louisville, Kentucky. Its mission is to facilitate exchanges through networks that promote meaningful outcomes for technologists.

wordpress-louisville.name: WordPress Louisville
wordpress-louisville.frequency: Meets the 2nd Tuesday every month @ 6:15 pm

ypal.name: Young Professionals Association of Louisville (YPAL)
ypal.description: The Young Professionals Association of Louisville (YPAL) provides leadership development, educational opportunities and philanthropic support to Louisville’s Young Professionals for the benefit of the local community.
